lexUnit.name: lean.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: incline from the perpendicular and rest against.

sentence.text: The only exception was the C.O. He leaned his backside against a table , arms folded .
With a shaky little breath she leaned her forehead against him .
Cara put her hand over his on the steering wheel , leaned her head against his shoulder .
He leant his bike against the gate and shook the sign .
She leaned the mop against the kitchen wall .
Sylvia nodded , and leaned her weight against the side of Carolyn 's chair .
Leaning the broomstick against the signpost , she grasped the handle and climbed carefully on to the top of the twigs and raised her head towards the words on the signpost arm .
I leaned the painting against the van and sat on a box and waited .
Fussily he searched for a safe place , finally leaning the contraption against the wall behind his chair before sitting down .
He stood aside and leaned his back against the wire paling as the hearse came round the comer .
She leaned her head in her hands .
Young Donald leaned his long-barrelled small-shot gun in the corner by the door and then his face darkened over .
Keach leaned his little forearms on her desk .
Then he removed it , laid it on the desk and leaned his chin on his clasped hands .
Kevin was waiting by the car , leaning his arms on its roof , bored , smoking a cigarette .
I twisted it into my Nikon body and leaned the heavy assembly on the balcony rail .
The man at the next table stands up , walks over and leans his hands on the chair next to Bill .
As he leaned his elbows on the table he observed maliciously , ` You look terrible . "
He pushed the empty plate away from him and leaned his arms on the table .
He turned and leaned his hips on the terrace railing , gazing into her face with disconcerting intensity .
He leant his arm along the top of the car door , letting his eyes rest on her face for one moment that felt like half a lifetime to her .
He leaned the chair back on two legs and put the sole of one shoe against the bedrails , then pulled on the rope of nylon until his biceps began to crack .
